name: TURBO.WIN
description: Turbo, built on Hyper, is a hyper-deflationary token with a unique auction system. It features a capped supply with all tokens distributed in the first 8 days, triggering full deflation afterward. Turbo utilizes 80% of system value to buy tokens + 8% of value for growing bonded liquidity growth. Volt enters deflation quickly with a massive buy and burn. Turbo Pumpamentals: Deflationary token Huge buy and burn Perpetual Auction system Full token distribution in 8 days. 80% of TitanX value used to buy Volt. Liquidity bonding with all Hyper tokens "The Treasure Volt" ensures perpetual auctions with deflationary tokenomics. The "Volt Wheel" amplifies the buy and burn among protocols with synergistic effect
